SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYYMM') AS fillinTime, t.OBJECT_CODE AS objectCode, t.OBJECT_NAME AS objectName, COUNT(1) AS faultCount FROM T_FAULT_INFO t WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM T_FAULT_ORDER a WHERE a.FAULT_NO = t.FAULT_NO AND a.ORDER_STATUS != '99' AND NVL(a.IS_FAULT,'10') = '10') AND t.MAJOR_CODE = '07'
AND TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 > TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND OBJECT_CODE IN
#{item}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMM'), t.OBJECT_CODE, t.OBJECT_NAME ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMM'), t.OBJECT_CODE
